title: Person accidentally shot in stomach by friend in northwest Charlotte
content:
CHARLOTTE, NC (WBTV) -
One person was seriously injured in a shooting in northwest Charlotte Thursday.
The incident happened around 6:30 p.m. on the 600 block of Reeves Court, near S. Hoskins Road. Medic confirmed one patient was being taken from the scene with serious injuries.
Police said the victim, whose name has not been released, was accidentally shot in the stomach by a friend. The person is expected to recover.
Officers said as of Thursday evening, they did not believe any charges would be filed.
